name: Pass Through
description:
Pass as many laser as you can. There are 3 modes available to play, which are normal,survival,time-attack.

Normal : Pass the obstacle for each levels
Survival : You have only one lives to pass all the obstacle.
Time-attack : How far you can pass by the time given.

Each type obstacle have their own pattern, if you get the pattern, easy for you to pass it.

*Internet access may be required (Optional)
This application contains optional video advertisements that can be viewed to provide you additional rewards.Some video rewards can be skip but if you skip it you will get less rewards.
Additional data charges may apply if roaming or not connected to Wi-fi.
